summary: A mysterious group kidnap a girl's sister. Years later, the group reappears and she is determined to get her sister back.
cast: Rina Takeda|Hina Tobimatsu|Tatsuya Naka|Kazutoshi Yokoyama|Richard Heselton|Kyôji Amano|Keisuke Horibe|Noriko Iriyama|Tatsuya Mori|Fuyuhiko Nishi|Ichirô Sugisawa|Kazuma Takeda|Saori Takizawa|Kôichi Yamadera
title: K.G.
